document_data.name: Poisoned Quill
document_data.mainbody: The '''Poisoned Quill''' were a tribe of [[merfolk]] in the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]] in the 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: This tribe was particularly known for hunting.
document_data.Possessions: All members of this tribe wielded [[spear]]s that were longer than the average length. They also carried small pouches that contained the spines of [[pufferfish]].
document_data.History: In the late-15{{th}} century DR, the [[sea elves]] of [[Myth Nantar]] sent a group of [[adventurer]]s to try and convince nearby merfolk tribes, including the Poisoned Quill, to aid them in a coming assault from the [[Red Wizards of Thay]]. The then leader of the tribe, Asirae, was eager to join the fray and felt her people were prepared for it. Though she was concerned that the other tribes, the [[Cerulean Shores]] and [[Deep Coves]], were not as well trained enough for such a battle.
document_data.Members: * [[Asirae Shipwrecker]], the leader of the tribe in the late-15{{th}} century DR.
